sub_title: Presales Lead Solution Engineer at Freshworks
summary: Results-driven and customer-oriented sales professional with extensive experience in leading and initiating high-performing teams. Proven ability to drive sales opportunities, develop solutions, and exceed customer expectations. A disciplined and responsible individual known for creating positive work environments that enhance team performance and satisfaction. Adaptable and flexible, constantly seeking ways to improve efficiency and automation. Experienced in project management, pre-sales, and IT across various sectors including Network and Telecommunication, Government, Energy, Retail, Education and Research, Industry, and Consultancy. Skilled in collaborating with diverse stakeholders and achieving outstanding results.

projects.title: Nuon Wind & Heat
projects.description:
Project Coordinator, Nuon Onshore Wind Development, WIN
Aug 2017 – Dec 2018

•	Led coordination efforts for five wind turbine park development projects across the Netherlands.
•	Served as deputy project manager, assisting the project manager in overseeing project activities and ensuring smooth operations.
•	Maintained and tracked comprehensive action lists involving internal and external stakeholders, ensuring timely completion of tasks.
•	Facilitated productive meetings and workshops with teams and suppliers, fostering collaboration and effective communication.
•	Established and maintained strong stakeholder relationships with municipalities, enhancing project success and regulatory compliance.
•	Effectively managed risk and issue management, ensuring potential obstacles were identified, addressed, and resolved promptly.
•	Provided regular reports to project managers, department managers, and steering groups, offering insights into project progress and key metrics.
•	Developed project timelines and allocated resources efficiently, optimizing project schedules and resource utilization.
•	Managed project team resources, overseeing their performance, development, and productivity.
•	Procured necessary products and services, ensuring timely availability and adherence to budget constraints.
•	Implemented SharePoint and managed document management environments, streamlining document access and version control.

PMO Professional, Nuon Heat (UK), WIN
Sept 2017 – Aug 2017

•	Played a pivotal role in establishing a new location for the Nuon Heat department in the UK.
•	Contributed to the successful setup of the new department location, ensuring smooth operations and efficient business processes.
•	Supported the project manager, allowing them to focus on primary business processes and strategic objectives.
•	Demonstrated strong organizational skills in coordinating project support activities and ensuring timely deliverables.

contributors.headline: Presales Lead Solution Engineer at Freshworks

projects.title: Program Management Officer - Capgemini ITSMaaS Program
projects.description:
ITSM-As-A-Service

The ITSMaaS Program is a Capgemini internal program for setting up a unified service desk tool that replace its predecessor. The program has been initiated due to reaching the end-of-life of the current tool. The new tool is called ITSM and comes with not only improvements, but also standardization of several different service desk tools that is being used by the Capgemini customers. 

•	Managed the migration of Capgemini's current service desk tool to an ITSM tooling.
•	Demonstrated financial management skills by monitoring project burn rates and costs, optimizing financial planning and control.
•	Facilitated steering group meetings, ensuring effective communication and decision-making among stakeholders.
•	Forecasted budgets, timelines, and resources accurately, enabling efficient resource allocation and project planning.
•	Reported project progress to stakeholders, providing transparency and insight into project status.
•	Effectively managed risks, issues, and changes, implementing mitigation strategies and driving successful outcomes.
•	Administered Clarity for time tracking, ensuring accurate reporting and adherence to project schedules.
•	Facilitated workshops and sessions, promoting collaboration and knowledge sharing among team members.
•	Managed resources efficiently, ensuring their optimal utilization and productivity.
•	Demonstrated strong document management skills, ensuring organized and accessible project documentation.
•	Implemented the ITSM tooling successfully, leading to a seamless migration for Capgemini customers and achieving significant benefits such as reduced maintenance costs, quicker response times, and time savings.

courses.name: How to work with Indian teams

profile_positions.description:
•	Work closely with the largest Enterprise customers to identify and solve their most critical business problems.
•	Supporting the sales team by taking a consultative role in customers' solution evaluation process.
•	Conducting effective requirements gathering to clearly identify customer problems.
•	Developed a thorough understanding of the Freshworks product portfolio and applied this to solve customer problems. 
•	Building solutions using the comprehensive product portfolio and demonstrating these to business and technical audiences.
•	Articulating the value of Freshworks solutions to a variety of audiences.
•	Developing and executing a technical sales strategy to secure a technical and functional win.
•	Evangelize a refreshing user experience on the Freshworks platform and partner events.
•	Maintained up-to-date knowledge of market competitors, product developments, and key differentiators.
•	Led strategic programs, such as customer journey sessions, to align roadmaps and outcomes with the executive suite.
•	Initiated the Value Selling methodology and implemented several improved process documents for all business units and customers.
•	Coordinated activities with internal sales, support, product management, and delivery teams.
•	Assisted customers in maximizing product value and identified new business opportunities.
•	Conducted workshops to identify and address customers' business challenges, delivering customized product demonstrations.
•	Provided feedback to product management for enhancements based on customer needs.
•	Responded to Requests for Information/Proposals and acted as a subject matter expert at executive briefings and marketing events.
•	Mentored and trained peers, colleagues, and partners.
•	Scoped and delivered Proof of Concept/Proof of Value engagements.
•	Demonstrated expertise in understanding business and technical problems, including key regulations, evolving needs, and security concerns.
